backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing per‑principal high scores, allowing updates only if higher, and exposing best score and a sorted leaderboard.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text map of frontend file paths to short functional summaries for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining the app’s light and dark theme palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including the root container and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app layout with header, auth status, tab navigation for game and leaderboard, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Component handling Internet Identity login state, showing sign-in button or account dropdown.
frontend/src/components/GameBoard.tsx: Grid of interactive colored tiles with active animations and click handling.
frontend/src/components/GameHud.tsx: HUD showing score, round, lives, and phase-specific status text.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Type definitions for game phases, tiles, and overall game state.
frontend/src/game/useMiniGame.ts: React hook implementing sequence-memory game logic, tile activation, scoring, lives, and progression.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login state and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch the leaderboard and submit scores through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper function to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Implements the mini-game UI flow including start, active gameplay, and game-over screens with score submission.
frontend/src/screens/LeaderboardScreen.t: Displays the leaderboard, handles loading and error states, and supports manual refresh.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Describes the project's features, requirements, and pending feature requests.
